mapper.update: update db_smtblackname set 'NAME' = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPER = #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESERVE1 = #{reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESERVE4 = #{reserve4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPERTIME = #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, RESERVE3 = #{reserve3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESERVE2 = #{reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DESCR = #{descr,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where SID = #{sid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: select SID, 'NAME', OPER, RESERVE1, RESERVE4, OPERTIME, RESERVE3, RESERVE2, DESCR from db_smtblackname
